chapters.title: Chapter 22: Gathering Clouds
chapters.info: The Empress (of Seanchan), p. 431 (487)—The supreme ruler of Seanchan. She is considered to be a direct descendant of the first Emperor of Seanchan, Luthair Paendrag Mondwhin. She presides over the Court of the Nine Moons on the Seanchan continent. She is Tuon's mother.
